name: Taco Revolution: The Rise Of The Taco Bandits
name_original: Taco Revolution: The Rise Of The Taco Bandits
description: Taco Revolution is a 2D pixel-based adventure game based on a society of tacos, friendly fishes, and an evil taco cat! As a famous pirate captain of the seas, you have just returned home to find that your best fish friends are being eaten by the nasty tacocat that lives amongst your taco friends. What a cat-astrophe! It just so is that you are the only one who can do something about it. Your ultimate goal? Build an army, round up the taco civilians, and fight the evil taco cat in order to save the fishies. Act quick! Or you might even end up being the tacocat’s next meal...
